author: alibaba
descript_str: Fastjson is a Java library that can be used to convert Java Objects into their JSON representation. It can also be used to convert a JSON string to an equivalent Java object. Fastjson can work with arbitrary Java objects including pre-existing objects that you do not have source-code of.
name: fastjson

author: wasabeef
descript_str: RecyclerView Animators is an Android library that allows developers to easily create RecyclerView with animations.
name: RecyclerView Animators

author: chrisjenx
descript_str: Custom fonts in Android an OK way.Are you fed up of Custom Views to set fonts? Or traversing the ViewTree to find TextViews? Yeah me too..
name: Calligraphy

author: airbnb
descript_str: Lottie is a mobile library for Android and iOS that parses Adobe After Effects animations exported as json with Bodymovin and renders them natively on mobile!
name: Lottie

author: niorgai
descript_str: This is a utils for status bar, And you do not need to change your style.xml file. The most feature is you can toggle
name: StatusBarCompat

author: chenupt
descript_str: An indicator like Morning Routine guide.It was originally based on BezierDemo.
name: SpringIndicator
